submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumSum(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        
        def findbd(u,d,l,r):
            newu = d
            newd = u
            newl = r
            newr = l
            has1 = False
            for i in range(u,d+1):
                for j in range(l,r+1):
                    if grid[i][j] == 1:
                        has1 = True
                        newu = min(newu,i)
                        newd = max(newd,i)
                        newl = min(newl,j)
                        newr = max(newr,j)
            if has1 == False:
                return -1,-1,-1,-1
            return newu,newd,newl,newr
        
        tu,td,tl,tr = findbd(0,len(grid)-1,0,len(grid[0])-1)
        res = (tr-tl+1)*(td-tu+1)
        for v in range(tu,td):
            s1,s2,s3,s4 = findbd(tu,v,tl,tr)
            t1,t2,t3,t4 = findbd(v+1,td,tl,tr)
            tmp1 = (s2-s1+1)*(s4-s3+1) if s1!=-1 else 0
            tmp2 = (t2-t1+1)*(t4-t3+1) if t1!=-1 else 0
            res = min(res,tmp1+tmp2)
            for h in range(tl,tr):
                p1,p2,p3,p4 = findbd(tu,v,tl,h)
                q1,q2,q3,q4 = findbd(tu,v,h+1,tr)
                tmp3 = (p2-p1+1)*(p4-p3+1) if p1!=-1 else 0
                tmp4 = (q2-q1+1)*(q4-q3+1) if q1!=-1 else 0
                res = min(res,tmp3+tmp4+tmp2)
                p1,p2,p3,p4 = findbd(v+1,td,tl,h)
                q1,q2,q3,q4 = findbd(v+1,td,h+1,tr)
                tmp3 = (p2-p1+1)*(p4-p3+1) if p1!=-1 else 0
                tmp4 = (q2-q1+1)*(q4-q3+1) if q1!=-1 else 0                
                res = min(res,tmp3+tmp4+tmp1)
            
            for v2 in range(v+1,td):
                p1,p2,p3,p4 = findbd(v+1,v2,tl,tr)
                q1,q2,q3,q4 = findbd(v2+1,td,tl,tr)
                tmp3 = (p2-p1+1)*(p4-p3+1) if p1!=-1 else 0
                tmp4 = (q2-q1+1)*(q4-q3+1) if q1!=-1 else 0
                res = min(res,tmp3+tmp4+tmp1)
        
        for h in range(tl,tr):
            s1,s2,s3,s4 = findbd(tu,td,tl,h)
            t1,t2,t3,t4 = findbd(tu,td,h+1,tr)
            tmp1 = (s2-s1+1)*(s4-s3+1) if s1!=-1 else 0
            tmp2 = (t2-t1+1)*(t4-t3+1) if t1!=-1 else 0
            res = min(res,tmp1+tmp2)
            for v in range(tu,td):
                p1,p2,p3,p4 = findbd(tu,v,tl,h)
                q1,q2,q3,q4 = findbd(v+1,td,tl,h)
                tmp3 = (p2-p1+1)*(p4-p3+1) if p1!=-1 else 0
                tmp4 = (q2-q1+1)*(q4-q3+1) if q1!=-1 else 0
                res = min(res,tmp3+tmp4+tmp2)
                p1,p2,p3,p4 = findbd(tu,v,h+1,tr)
                q1,q2,q3,q4 = findbd(v+1,td,h+1,tr)
                tmp3 = (p2-p1+1)*(p4-p3+1) if p1!=-1 else 0
                tmp4 = (q2-q1+1)*(q4-q3+1) if q1!=-1 else 0
                res = min(res,tmp3+tmp4+tmp1)
            for h2 in range(h+1,tr):
                p1,p2,p3,p4 = findbd(tu,td,h+1,h2)
                q1,q2,q3,q4 = findbd(tu,td,h2+1,tr)
                tmp3 = (p2-p1+1)*(p4-p3+1) if p1!=-1 else 0
                tmp4 = (q2-q1+1)*(q4-q3+1) if q1!=-1 else 0
                res = min(res,tmp3+tmp4+tmp1)
        return res
